person.persName: George M. Pettit (Powell County merchant and Stanton postmaster)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky merchant and Stanton postmaster. Kentucky native. Married Priscilla W. Wills Pettit in 1858. Father of Mary T. Pettit. Postmaster of Stanton, Kentucky from 1860 to 1864.
